name: @adobe/uxp-optimized
description: Library of react components optimized for Adobe's Unified Extensibility Platform
author: Kris Nye <knye@adobe.com>

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p lib && mkdir -p dist && cp src/devsample/*.json dist && cp {.npmignore,package.json} lib && echo disabled: ln -sfn ../node_modules lib/node_modules
scripts.build: yarn run copy && parcel build src/devsample/index.html && tsc
scripts.deploy: rm -rf lib && tsc && yarn run test && npm version patch && yarn run copy && cd lib && npm publish
